metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000004 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In the Linux kernel 4.12, 3.10, 2.6 and possibly earlier versions a racecondition vulnerability exists in the sound system, this can lead to adeadlock and denial of service condition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000004` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-10-generic - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-4.15.0-10-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-4.15.0-10-lowlatency - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-extra-4.15.0-10-generic - 4.15.0-10.11
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1006-raspi2 - 4.15.0-1006.7
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1001-aws - 4.15.0-1001.1
No subscription required
